metadata.title: CVE-2024-26978 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:serial: max310x: fix NULL pointer dereference in I2C instantiationWhen trying to instantiate a max14830 device from userspace:    echo max14830 0x60 > /sys/bus/i2c/devices/i2c-2/new_devicewe get the following error:    Unable to handle kernel NULL pointer dereference at virtual address...    ...    Call trace:        max310x_i2c_probe+0x48/0x170 [max310x]        i2c_device_probe+0x150/0x2a0    ...Add check for validity of devtype to prevent the error, and abort probewith a meaningful error message.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
